Constructor Summary
Board()
          The public Board() constructor of the board class creates a board with full of null objects, and adds a few arbitrary pieces to the board.
Board(Board b)
          The second constructor public Board(Board b) constructs a new board object based on an existing board.

          the setSquare(int row, int col, Piece piece) method adds a given piece to the board, also given a row and column to put the piece.

Constructor Detail

Board

public Board()
The public Board() constructor of the board class creates a board with full of null objects, and adds a few arbitrary pieces to the board.

Board

public Board(Board b)
The second constructor public Board(Board b) constructs a new board object based on an existing board. This is used to copy the board to be copied when the Minimax AI is computing future moves.

Parameters:
b -
